Definition: a body of fundamental principles or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed
a person who is a member of a state or country, having rights and responsibilities
the state of being free within society
a deep sense of satisfaction or pleasure in one's own achievements
a feeling of expectation and desire for a certain thing to happen
relating to or involving the use of nuclear energy or weapons
an act of selecting or making a decision when faced with two or more possibilities
a thought or suggestion as to a possible course of action
